Key Match Events: Luka Modric scored a goal in the 52nd minute to win the match for Croatia
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Opus Arena in Osijek, Croatia
Others: Croatia won the match 1-0 with a goal from Luka Modric
The starting formation for Croatia was 3-3-1-3 and for Poland was 5-3-2
Several players received yellow cards during the match, including Mateo Kovacic, Marko Pjaca, Petar Sucic, Jakub Bednarek, and Ante Budimir
